channel.title: Posts on useful snippets
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on useful snippets

item.title: secure tunnels to localhost using ngrok
item.description: Sometimes you want to expose a local server to the internet.

item.title: Copying SSH keys to a remote machine
item.description: Ideally, both source and destination machines have ssh-copy-id available, but sometimes you have to pipe a cat instead.

item.title: adding weight history to Garmin Connect (in bulk)
item.description: Garmin Connect can now import csv files from FitBit. This means that I can upload my old records of my weight to Garmin without having to enter each one manually. It will be nice to see everything I’ve recorded in Connect and on the app.

item.title: replaying a text log on a serial port (using python)
